interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Unny Club Black Square Lipstick (Magenta) | matte lipstick
Review Date: 2020/09/03
Store: UNNY CLUB
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'UNNY CLUB', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Item Form': 'Stick', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '2.8 x 0.91 x 0.87 inches; 1.13 Ounces'}
Review Text: This Unny Club Lipstick arrived yesterday, and I'm wearing it today.  I'm a blotter, so I gave it a try and almost, most of it is staying on the lips, though lips are showing through a bit.  Perhaps I blotted too soon!  This lipstick has a lot of oils added to the formula, and that definitely helps with the moisture, though I'm noticing a bit of flakiness (could be just my lips).  The oils were listed on the Amazon site, the actual product box is written in Korean.  It's a matte, so no gloss, just actual color.  The square black plastic tube has a magnet installed to make sure the top stays in place, a nice feature.  *Now, about the color....I got this because it's supposed to be "Magenta".  To my reasoning, the color Magenta is a red/blue, purplish-red shade.  This Magenta (MO6) is closer to a muted Scarlet, an intense red with a bit of orange.....no blue at all.  Anyway, it's a pretty color even though I was expecting a different shade.  Not sure if the wrong label was installed, or if that's the name of color that the manufacturer chose.  Barb
Review Title: A nice matte look and feeling, but color is different.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
LumaRx Facial Cleansing Brush with 1-Minute Pulsing Timer and LED Speed Indicator Light, Rechargeable and Showerproof, White/Silver {'Material': 'Silver', 'Brand': 'LumaRx', 'Color': 'White/Silver', 'Power Source': 'electric', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.88 x 7 x 10 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '3.88 x 7 x 10 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1', 'UPC': '074590543216', 'Manufacturer': 'LumaRx'} What is possibly better than a good hot bath, and I mean in the Tub! A good soak is totally relaxing. I was in a deep soak cycle when I was able to first use this product. My old one uses replaceable batteries and not water proof. This is water proof, and rechargeable---perfect for the bath. Try not to let it submerge, I think that's common sense. Works just fine in the shower too. Started out with a good exfoliate which removes and loosens dry skin. Next step was to use Dove liquid on the brushes----feels fabulous and clean. That is how I enjoy my personal time.
All of the heads you will ever need are included with this luxury product from the very sensitive brush up to the massaging brush head, there are three. It has three speeds, a very small footprint and lasts a long time on a single charge, a one minute timer allowing the right time per area. It really isn't complicated at all---also comes with a patent carrying case, large enough to hold everything. Excellent product! Exfoliate And Clean Lesentia Tinted Moisturizer with SPF 31 – Tinted Moisturizer For Face With Spf and Blemish Concealer with All Natural Ingredients like Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E and Zinc* (Medium - 2fl oz) L'esentia {'Brand': "L'esentia", 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Active Ingredients': 'jojoba,vitamin e,zinc', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '6.77 x 2.32 x 2.24 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '850016254009'} Barb: I'm not so sure if I like wearing this L'esentia Tinted Moisturizer. The SPF 31 is supposed to be great if out in the sun, but this product doesn't really feel like it's absorbed into my face, leaving it shiny. I don't want it dripping down into my eyes! If I happen to touch my face it leaves a slick film on the fingers, and I worry about touching anything else and leaving a smudge of the tint. The moisturizer has an unusual scent when applied, smelling like natural clay. Maybe that's the Zinc Oxide? After a while it's not quite as noticeable. I usually use a same brand moisturizer with SPF 15 and the liquid foundation also SPF 15, and they appear to be much better absorbed into my face. If this product works for others, that's good. I'm very fair, and I must say that the tint actually worked by putting a little natural color in my face. That was the only part worthwhile for me. Lots of sun protection, but don't like feel on face. RAREKIND Fade Matte Lipstick by Amorepacific - 10 Colors, Cruelty-Free Nourishing Lip Stick, Velvety-smooth, Long-Lasting Moisturizing Lipstick - 3.2g Maple Road RAREKIND {'Package Dimensions': '3.3 x 0.9 x 0.9 inches; 0.95 Ounces'} This RAREKIND tube of lipstick arrived earlier as I was getting dressed to greet the day. So I was able to try it out now! The color I have is called Maple Road, a very intense, but subtle brownish red. It's a matte, and so far has good staying power, and I'm a blotter (only a tiny bit on the tissue). The box that contains the hard plastic square container tube of lipstick says "Fade Matte Lipstick", but not sure what is meant. The lipstick itself is the usual swivel type, but with my lipstick when I swiveled it up to use, it didn't want to swivel back down into the protective tube. I had to gently push the lipstick down into the tube. Hopefully it's just a glitch with mine. Anyway, it appears to be a nice lipstick that stays on for a long while, and feels comfortable on the lips Good staying power, feels like nothing's there! Unny Club Black Square Lipstick (Magenta) | matte lipstick UNNY CLUB {'Brand': 'UNNY CLUB', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Item Form': 'Stick', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '2.8 x 0.91 x 0.87 inches; 1.13 Ounces'} This Unny Club Lipstick arrived yesterday, and I'm wearing it today. I'm a blotter, so I gave it a try and almost, most of it is staying on the lips, though lips are showing through a bit. Perhaps I blotted too soon! This lipstick has a lot of oils added to the formula, and that definitely helps with the moisture, though I'm noticing a bit of flakiness (could be just my lips). The oils were listed on the Amazon site, the actual product box is written in Korean. It's a matte, so no gloss, just actual color. The square black plastic tube has a magnet installed to make sure the top stays in place, a nice feature. *Now, about the color....I got this because it's supposed to be "Magenta". To my reasoning, the color Magenta is a red/blue, purplish-red shade. This Magenta (MO6) is closer to a muted Scarlet, an intense red with a bit of orange.....no blue at all. Anyway, it's a pretty color even though I was expecting a different shade. Not sure if the wrong label was installed, or if that's the name of color that the manufacturer chose. Barb A nice matte look and feeling, but color is different.
profile:
**User Profile Summary**

- **Personal Care Enthusiast**: Maintains a strong interest in skincare and personal hygiene products, particularly those focused on relaxation and simplicity. Recently ventured into lip products, further expanding into the makeup realm of personal care.

- **Preference for Convenience**: Values features that enhance ease of use, favoring rechargeable and waterproof items, along with products that minimize maintenance needs. This is evident in their choice of lip products which emphasize user-friendly experiences.

- **Product Quality**: Appreciates luxury items that include all essential components and ensures consistency in performance. The recent purchase reflects their expectation for high-quality formulations, even with potential drawbacks.

- **Relaxation Focus**: Engages in self-care routines that promote comfort and relaxation, viewing product use as part of a soothing experience. This focus extends to their makeup selections, seeking comfort in application and wear.

- **Effectiveness & Texture Sensitivity**: Prefers products that deliver clear benefits and has a heightened sensitivity towards textures and absorption, especially concerning lip formulations.

- **Positive User Experience**: Likely to rate products positively if they meet expectations for functionality and pleasure, balancing effective wear with a satisfying application. Recent experiences indicate an openness to exploring shades and understanding potential variances in product descriptions.

Overall, this user reflects a consistent preference for high-quality, efficient personal care solutions that enhance their calming self-care routine while being mindful of performance and enjoyment.
